name: Wired Up (Frost Falcon)
description:
Wired Up is a tower defense game with a twist: in order to make your towers work, you have to connect them to eachother. Doing so will provide unique benefits depending on what tower types you connected. You'll have to plan you defense carefully to defeat all 25 rounds.

Credits:

Design, art, programming - Justin Fisher

Music - Julian Maniquis
